title: Ann Arbor Petitions Under Review
name: Ann Arbor Petitions Under Review
description:
Planning and Development petitions under review information and locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Planning and Development petitions under review in the City of Ann Arbor. The planning process is described on the City of Ann Arbor website.  

More information concerning Planning and Development petitions under review can be found here: http://www.a2gov.org/government/communityservices/planninganddevelopment/planning/Pages/CitizenParticipation.aspx

properties.title: Glacier Hills Skilled Nursing Care Facility Addition - SITE PLAN - 1200 EARHART RD
properties.description: (12/30/2009 15:53  CC)  Glacier Hills Community – Site Plan (CC): Located at Earhart Road and US-23. The petitioner is proposing new 59,994 square foot skilled memory care building with a total of 80 beds. Several other buildings on the site will have minor renovations and additions including a 5,604 square foot addition to the main Manor building. Some units in existing buildings will be re-configured to provide more 1 bed units. After all renovations and new construction, the total number of additional units on the site will be 36. Parking will be re-configured on the site and detention will be enlarged to accommodate the extra flow. Three landmark trees will be removed for construction and no activity will take place in the woodland area on the south side of the site.

properties.title: Heritage Row Apartments PUD Site Plan - SITE PLAN - 407 S FIFTH AV
properties.description: (12/30/2009 15:14  CC)  Heritage Row – PUD Zoning and Site Plan (CC): Located at 407-437 S. Fifth Avenue. The petitioner is proposing to save and renovate all 7 houses on the site and construct three new buildings in the rear of the site. The three new buildings will contain a total of 44 two and three bedroom units equaling 44,738 square feet. The existing houses will contain a total of 38 units with a majority of one and two bedroom units equaling a total of 26,873 square feet for a total on site of 71,611 square feet of buildings and 82 units. Storm water detention/retention will be in tanks at the rear of the site. There are proposing one driveway for the parking area which will contain 60 parking spaces underground below the buildings in the rear of the site.

properties.title: Heritage Row Apartments PUD Zoning - ZONING - 407 S FIFTH AV
properties.description: (12/30/2009 15:14  CC)  Heritage Row – PUD Zoning and Site Plan (CC): Located at 407-437 S. Fifth Avenue. The existing houses will contain a total of 38 units with a majority of one and two bedroom units equaling a total of 26,873 square feet for a total on site of 71,611 square feet of buildings and 82 units. Storm water detention/retention will be in tanks at the rear of the site. There are proposing one driveway for the parking area which will contain 60 parking spaces underground below the buildings in the rear of the site.

properties.title: Michigan Islamic Academy Building Addition - SITE PLAN - 2301 PLYMOUTH RD
properties.description: (1/4/2010 16:08  MK)  The petitioner is proposing to remove the existing classroom trailer and construct a new 10,500 square foot three-story classroom building. The new building will have a footprint of 3,500 square feet and will re-locate classrooms from the existing trailer and adjacent buildings. No increase in student enrollment is proposed.  No parking spaces will be removed for the addition

properties.title: Michigan Islamic Academy Gym Addition - SITE PLAN - 2301 PLYMOUTH RD
properties.description: (5/10/2010 16:33  CC)  This is a revision to the recently approved 3-story, 10,500-square foot classroom addition located on the northern rear of the existing building.  The petitioner proposes an administrative amendment to the site plan to convert the previously approved addition into a 2-story 13,496-square foot classroom and gymnasium addition.  The total floor area on site increases from 31,651 to 34,719-square feet, triggering administrative amendment review.  The classroom trailer located at the rear of the site will be removed once the addition is complete.  No additional students or administrators will be added to the school as a result of this new proposal.

properties.title: The Moravian PUD Site Plan: multi-family residential - SITE PLAN - 201 E MADISON ST
properties.description:
(12/31/2008 10:51  AD)  Proposal demolish existing buildings and construct a four-story residential building containing 60 units on top of one level of partially underground parking deck.  Site size is 0.85 acres (37,026 sq ft), building height is 68.5 ft, building size is 72,216 sq ft, total parking spaces provided is 100.  Site plan petition in conjunction with The Madison PUD Zoning District petition.

(12/31/2008 11:17  AD)  PUD Zoning District petition to rezone site to allow multiple-family residential use along with customary accessory uses.  Proposed density up to 60 dwelling units, maximum height 68.5 ft, minimum front setbacks approximately 8 ft, minimum parking 1.5 spaces per dwelling unit.  Zoning petition associated with The Madison PUD Site Plan petition.

(7/8/2010 4:01 PM CC)
The existing daycare center proposes adding a 264- square foot addition to the rear of the house for a new total square footage of 4,115-square feet.  This proposed space will be used for interior reorganization of the facility and will not increase the number of students or caregivers (33 students  and 7 adults maximum).

properties.title: Chrysler Jeep of Ann Arbor Showroom Addition - SITE PLAN - 2060 W STADIUM BLV
properties.description: (6/18/2010 11:58  JK)  This administrative amendment proposes to add 919 square feet of space to the existing showroom by extending the glass walls a few feet in a number directions at the Chrysler Jeep of Ann Arbor site at 2060 W. Stadium Blvd.

properties.title: Thurston ES Parking Lot Reconstruction - SITE PLAN - 2300 PRAIRIE ST
properties.description: (4/26/2010 15:32  AD)  Project to remove and reconstruct the parking lot, entrance driveways and parts of the sidewalk leading to the building's main entrances.  Separate school bus and parent drop-off locations will be created and storm water management for the parking lot will be provided.  Also proposed is a multi-dumpster enclosure, revised site lighting, new landscaping to replace removed trees and minimal utility work.

properties.title: Platt Road Center - Admin Amendment - SITE PLAN - 3100 PLATT RD
properties.description: (3/18/2010 15:24  JK)  The petitioner proposes to reconfigure the existing parking lot and shift a sidewalk.  No change to the number of parking spaces or to the existing building.

properties.title: Arbor Hills Nature Area - ZONING - GREEN RD VACANT
properties.description:
(1/21/2010 10:52  AD)  Rezoning existing park from PUD to PL Public Land.  No other changes are proposed beyond reclassification on the official Zoning Map of the City.

(1/21/2010 11:16  AD)  This existing park is being rezoned from PUD to PL Public Land. A recent inventory of city parkland revealed that this park still retained its original zoning classification from before it was acquired by the city. No changes to the current park are being proposed. This action will only change the official city zoning map. It is city policy that all publicly owned land be zoned PL.

No changes to the current park are being proposed. This action will only change the official city zoning map. It is city policy that all publicly owned land be zoned PL.
